comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: 'Raymond Reath Powell (November 20, 1888 in Siloam Springs, Arkansas - October 16, 1962 in Chillicothe, Missouri), was a professional baseball player who played outfielder in the Major Leagues from 1913-1924. He would play for the Detroit Tigers and Boston Braves. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Powell_(baseball)
